messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: Call this _SYNC_SERVER.

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: _SYNC_SERVER_PORTS.

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: nit: Need only one blank line here.

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: The name CheckSyncAccount is a little ambiguous. How about calling this function SignInToSyncAndVerifyState?

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: GetSyncInfo() grabs sync state directly from the ProfileSyncService. Navigating to about:sync here isn't a prerequisite. Any reason you think it's necessary?

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: This seems to be copied from sync.py. It might make sense to replace the corresponding blocks in that file with a call to this function.

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: Calling this method _LaunchPythonSyncServer() is probably more descriptive of what it does.  What do you think?

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: Same comment as above. It's more descriptive to say that you're starting a python sync server.

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: s/propograted/propagated/

messages.author: Raghu Simha
messages.text: The bookmarks ought to be an exact match after they are synced. Are you observing a difference? (It could be a bug if you are.)
